entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
